EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar Registration Confirmed - Fuel Saving in the Era of the Connected Aircraft
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}},
You're now registered for Honeywell Aerospace's upcoming webinar. Here are the details you'll need: Webinar: Fuel Saving in the Era of the Connected Aircraft
Date: Wednesday, October 10
Time: 8:00 a.m. PT / 11:00 a.m. ET
Please click on the link below to add this event to your calendar. {{my.Add to Calendar:default=edit me}}
Webcast Link - https://honeywell.zoom.us/j/342437450 <[[https://honeywell.zoom.us/j/342437450]]>
See you soon!
Sincerely,
Honeywell Aerospace Event Team
